author.name: Theoretical and Applied Mechanics, Department of Mechanics, School of Mechanics and Engineering Science, Shanghai University

entry.title: HOME
entry.content:
Welcome to Hanfeng Zhai's page!
________________________________________________________________
I am currently a **Bachelor of Science** student major in Theoretical and Applied Mechanics at the [Department of Mechanics, SMES](https://smes.shu.edu.cn/) at [Shanghai University](https://www.shu.edu.cn/). For more details, please visit my [bio](http://hanfengzhai.net/about/).

Recent News

________________________________

  • [Dec. 19th, 2020]: Hanfeng receives the Shanghai University Academic Scholarship (Top Class) award and Shanghai University Arts and Sports Scholarship. Details can be accessed by SHU staff/students at link.
  • [Oct. 21st, 2020]: Our poster for The Design of The Lightweight Compressive Interlayer displayed in the hall of SMES as outstanding undergraduateâ€™s course design. [Picture]

  • [Aug. 5th, 2020]: Our poster for Design of Intelligent Tuning Equipment for Stringed Instruments is selected as backup poster of Shanghai University for National College Student Innovation Forum. See our poster.

  • [Feb. 30th, 2020]: Hanfeng delivered a online course for the students of Department of Mechanics as a course project of Theory of Elasticity. Click for backup video.

  • [Oct. 28th, 2019]: Our poster for The Design of The Lightweight Compressive Interlayer is displayed in the Virtural Simulation Lab at School of Mechanics and Engineering Science. See poster and photo.
